name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 30, in Linyi, Shandong, the Dongmeng Huizhong Cooperative in Mengyin County collapsed, and the depositors have been unable to withdraw their money since last month, so they came to the cooperative to defend their rights and seek justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After searching, it was found that Banai’s singer homepage disappeared from QQ Music and NetEase Cloud Music platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 25, a netizen posted on Douban, "How did you find out that the overall environment has deteriorated?", which sparked discussion among netizens. As of the time of posting, the post could no longer be found, and the screenshot showed that this was a non-public discussion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 16:00 on June 30, the outer wall of a house collapsed on Huadi Avenue North in Liwan District, Guangzhou, and one person was suspected to be trapped at the scene. Many firefighting, police, and ambulance vehicles were parked along the street. As of 19:30 on the 30th, the on-site search and rescue was still ongoing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of December 31, 2023, the total number of members of the Communist Party of China is 99.185 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 29, the Realme GT Neo6 SE phone released an update that will connect to the Internet to detect whether the phone name (used for WiFi hotspots or Bluetooth names) contains sensitive characters

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Flood situation in Meishan Town, Huzhou City, Zhejiang Province on June 30

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The rocket crash site is 3 kilometers away from the residential area. A blogger posted that some villagers' windows were shattered and ambulances and police cars went to the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Caixin reports more information about Hu Youping

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 1, Xi'an, Shaanxi. Road collapse occurred near Kaiyuan Gate on the West Second Ring Road from south to north. Video shows that there was a big pit on the road in question, and water gushed out from the water pipes buried under the road from time to time.
Official: During the construction of the connecting passage between Kaiyuanmen Station and Tumen Station on Metro Loop Line 8, water and sand suddenly gushed out. There were no casualties on the scene, and the specific cause is under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 30, a road landslide occurred in the Pingwu section of Hunan Pingdong Expressway.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 30, Zhuzhou, Hunan. An owner posted a video saying that the developer of Greenland Intercity Space delivered the house, and the ceiling could be easily pierced with a wooden stick, and the dust would fall off when touched.
On July 1, the owner, Mr. Chen, said: This house was originally unfinished, and it was finally delivered. The developer said that this was a minor quality defect caused by insufficient cement strength, and repaired it for me. We had no choice but to accept it in order to let our children go to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 1, Yueyang, Hunan. Water situation in Pingjiang County.
The video shows that some residents were trapped in the water and an elderly person was injured by the collapsed roof. Since 8:30 on July 1, the flood emergency response in Pingjiang County has been upgraded to Level II.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 30, Zhengzhou, Henan. The Xincheng Shiguang Impression real estate project delayed delivery, and the owners held national flags and marched in the scorching heat to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Tencent issued an announcement to crack down on content related to "inciting Sino-Japanese confrontation and provoking extreme nationalism", which was boycotted by a large number of netizens. Some netizens said that they can choose not to play Tencent games, but patriotism is a must, and they hope that Huawei and Xiaomi can develop alternative software.
https://t.co/LYXGQ3wAEE

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 30, Caixin reported that the audit report showed that in 2023, social insurance subsidies for 109,000 people in some regions were not paid, hundreds of units defrauded 130 million yuan in various subsidies by fabricating labor relations, and some labor dispatch companies withheld 75.58 million yuan in workers' remuneration and social insurance fees. ​​​
https://t.co/VEg2GFBq9U

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a piece of news that "Ma Weidu's company suddenly laid off 80 employees without prior notice" attracted attention online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 1, a report from the third-party platform QuestMobile showed that Xianyu, along with Xiaohongshu and Bilibili, became the most popular APP among high-value young people on the entire network, and Xianyu's popularity among high-value young people exceeded that of Bilibili.
High-value young people refer to young people in first-tier, new first-tier, and second-tier cities with a monthly online spending power of more than 2,000 yuan.
